content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM obtains most of your personal information through the forms and applications that you fill out in connection with your employment or its termination, for example, if you fill out a job application. EPAM may also obtain information as a result of your use of company resources and systems. In addition, EPAM may obtain personal information about you from other sources, for example, the results of background checks or drug screenings (if any). \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
